name: Red Cell (BadVillainStudio)
description:
Red Cell

Red Cell is a game made by 3 students about a man that needs to escape prison. The game will be based on the Estado Novo era and the political prisons. The game will be low polly and aesthetically similar to those PS1 games like Silent Hill or Resident Evil

For now this is just a PROTOTYPE, the final game that will be released late July will have more content like story, better audio and bigger map. This is just for tests.

This is a stealth game so avoid the guards and try to escape prison. Remember that you make noise while walking, so try to crouch instead to move silently. Throw small objects to distract guards, these will make a noise on the impact. The guards will investigate that noise.

Please answer this form after playing the game. Thank you.

Ps: We will try to fix any bugs that may appear as soon we know them.

HOW TO PLAY

Download the file, uncompress it, windows folder and click in Badvillainstudio.exe

Feedback Form -  https://forms.gle/FZUFYkzVw2Adwt1h8

Use the following commands:

WASD - Movement

Space bar - Jump

Ctr - to crouch

E - Interact

A - To open the door (when lockpicking)

Mouse Wheel / Numbers - to change the inventory

LMB (Left Mouse Button) - to throw the rocks

RMB (Right Mouse Button)- to cancel the throwing
